channel.title: Add f1, f2, f3, etc?
channel.description: I want to know how I can add f1, f2, etc so people can quick switch to dds, or whatever.. Can someone help me out?...

item.title: Add f1, f2, f3, etc?
item.dc:creator: @FuryofEdge FuryofEdge
item.description:

I’ll post in a sec, I have to add it to the .java file again. It was pointing at the dot operator in between client and aboolean or w\e. Gimme 2 mins…

item.title: Add f1, f2, f3, etc?
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Wrong section, use the Client help section next time.

In your ‘Applet_Sub1’ class, you’ll see something like:

if(i == KeyEvent.VK_F12){ if(Client.cameratoggle){ System.out.println("Camera Movement On"); Client.cameratoggle = true; }else if(Client.cameratoggle == false){ System.out.println("Camera Movement Off"); Client.cameratoggle = false; } }

Beneath it, add:

if (i == KeyEvent.VK_F1) { Client.aBoolean1153 = true; Client.anInt1221 = 0; Client.aBoolean1103 = true; } if (i == KeyEvent.VK_F2) { Client.aBoolean1153 = true; Client.anInt1221 = 1; Client.aBoolean1103 = true; } if (i == KeyEvent.VK_F3) { Client.aBoolean1153 = true; Client.anInt1221 = 2; Client.aBoolean1103 = true; } if (i == KeyEvent.VK_F4) { Client.aBoolean1153 = true; Client.anInt1221 = 3; Client.aBoolean1103 = true; } if (i == KeyEvent.VK_F5) { Client.aBoolean1153 = true; Client.anInt1221 = 4; Client.aBoolean1103 = true; } if (i == KeyEvent.VK_F6) { Client.aBoolean1153 = true; Client.anInt1221 = 5; Client.aBoolean1103 = true; } if (i == KeyEvent.VK_F7) { Client.aBoolean1153 = true; Client.anInt1221 = 6; Client.aBoolean1103 = true; } if (i == KeyEvent.VK_F8) { Client.aBoolean1153 = true; Client.anInt1221 = 8; Client.aBoolean1103 = true; } if (i == KeyEvent.VK_F9) { Client.aBoolean1153 = true; Client.anInt1221 = 9; Client.aBoolean1103 = true; } if (i == KeyEvent.VK_F10) { Client.aBoolean1153 = true; Client.anInt1221 = 10; Client.aBoolean1103 = true; } if (i == KeyEvent.VK_F11) { Client.aBoolean1153 = true; Client.anInt1221 = 11; Client.aBoolean1103 = true; } if (i == KeyEvent.VK_F12) { Client.aBoolean1153 = true; Client.anInt1221 = 12; Client.aBoolean1103 = true; }

Read full topic
